Michael Byrd | Mathematics Ph.D. candidate at Clemson University

Welcome to my Website!

My name is Michael Byrd and I am currently a mathematics Ph.D. candidate at Clemson University working with Dr. Michael Burr. I received my M.S. in Mathematics from the University of North Carolina Wilmington under the guidance of Dr. Russell Herman. I also received my B.S. in Mathematics with Honors from UNCW. In my spare time, I enjoy playing video games and hanging out with my friends.
